name: COMP6 ANI-MD
tagline: Benchmark containing MD trajectories from the ANI-1x potential.
description: A member of the COMP6 benchmark set, this dataset contains MD trajectories generated using the ANI-1x potential at 300K for 14 drug molecules and two peptides. Each trajectory is 128 frames subsampled from 1 ns of dynamics. Reference calculations are perfomed at the \u03c9B97x/6-31g* level of theory. This dataset is also hosted at github.com/isayev/COMP6.

citations._acs_citation: Smith, J. S.; Nebgen, B.; Lubbers, N.; Isayev, O. & Roitberg, A. E. Less is more: Sampling chemical space with active learning. J. Chem. Phys., 2018, 148, 241733.
